{
	"schemaVersion": "1.2",
	"description": "Backup logs to S3",
	"parameters": {},
	"runtimeConfig": {
		"aws:runShellScript": {
			"properties": [{
				"id": "0.aws:runShellScript",
				"runCommand": [
					"",
					"ASGNAME='Lambda_test'",
					"LIFECYCLEHOOKNAME='LifecycleHook'",
					"SNSTARGET='arn:aws:sns:us-west-2:490416305747:AutoScaling'",
					"INSTANCEID=$(curl http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/instance-id)",
					"REGION=$(curl http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/placement/availability-zone)",
					"REGION=${REGION::-1}",
					"HOOKRESULT='CONTINUE'",
					"MESSAGE=''",
					"#!/bin/bash",

					"nagios_client_cleanup() {mv $CURR_DIR/new_client* /tmp/.;mv $CURR_DIR/decom_client* /tmp/.;rm -rf /etc/nagios;sed -i s/nrpe/#nrpe/g /etc/services; userdel nagios}",
					"nagios_client_uninstall() {",
					"service nrpe stop",
					"rpm -q nagios-plugins",
					"if [[ $? -ne 0 ]]; then",
					"echo 'Nagios Client/Plugins is not installed' >> $LOG",
					"else",
					"rpm -e nrpe",
					"rpm -e nagios-plugins",
					"if [[ $? -ne 0 ]]",
					"then",
					"echo 'Nagios package removal failed' >> $LOG",
					"else",
					"echo 'Nagios package removed' >> $LOG",
					"fi",
					"fi}",

					"nagios_client_capture() {",
					"echo 'Starting Nagios Client Configuration'",
					"echo 'Capturing Nagios client information in file'",
					"nagios_node=`hostname -f`",
					"nagios_node_ip=`hostname -i`",
					"nagios_node_os=`uname -s`",
					"if [ $nagios_node_os='Linux' ]",
					"then",
					"nagios_node_os1=`echo linux`",
					"else",
					"echo 'Not Linux OS Exiting RC 2'",
					"exit 2",
					"fi",
					"P_IP_FILE_PATH=`echo /tmp/nagios/decom_client$nagios_node$CURR_DATE.txt`",
					"echo 'CUSTOMERCODE:$CUSTOMERCODE' >> $P_IP_FILE_PATH",
					"echo 'SUBACCOUNT:$SUBACCOUNT' >> $P_IP_FILE_PATH",
					"echo 'OWNER_CONTACT:$owner_contact' >> $P_IP_FILE_PATH",
					"echo 'OWNER_EMAIL:$owner_email' >> $P_IP_FILE_PATH",
					"echo 'nagios_template:$nagios_template' >> $P_IP_FILE_PATH",
					"echo 'customername:$P_ACCOUNT_NAME' >> $P_IP_FILE_PATH",
					"echo 'NagiosNode:$nagios_node' >> $P_IP_FILE_PATH",
					"echo 'NagiosNode:$nagios_node_os1' >> $P_IP_FILE_PATH",
					"cat /tmp/server_role.txt >> $P_IP_FILE_PATH",
					"if [ -e $P_IP_FILE_PATH ]",
					"then",
					"echo 'Nagios Client information file capture success'",
					"curl -v -F 'file=@$P_IP_FILE_PATH' -F'filename=$P_IP_FILE_PATH' -X POST http://192.0.0.3/php/upload.php",
					"else",
					"echo 'Nagios Client information file capture failed'",
					"echo 'Exiting rc 2'",
					" exit 2;",
					"fi}",
					"if [ $(id -u) -ne 0 ]; then",
					"echo 'Not a root user, Please run as root user'",
					"exit 1",
					"fi",

					"if [[ $# -ne 5 ]]; then",
					"echo 'Wrong Number of Variables passed exiting'",
					"exit 1",
					"fi",
					"CURR_DIR='/tmp/nagios'",
					"CURR_DATE=`date +%Y%m%d`",
					"CUSTOMERCODE=$1",
					"SUBACCOUNT=$2",
					"owner_contact=$3",
					"owner_email=$4",
					"myhost=`hostname`",
					"P_ACCOUNT_NAME=$5",
					"nagios_template='IMI'",
					"mkdir -p /tmp/nagios",
					"LOG=/tmp/nagios/unregister-`date +%Y_%m_%d_%H_%M_%S`.log",
					"touch $LOG",

					"nagios_client_capture",
					"nagios_client_uninstall",
					"nagios_client_cleanup",


					"aws sns publish --subject 'ASG Backup' --message \"$MESSAGE\"  --target-arn ${SNSTARGET} --region ${REGION}",
					"aws autoscaling complete-lifecycle-action --lifecycle-hook-name ${LIFECYCLEHOOKNAME} --auto-scaling-group-name ${ASGNAME} --lifecycle-action-result ${HOOKRESULT} --instance-id ${INSTANCEID}  --region ${REGION}"
				]
			}]
		}
	}
}
Name: arn:aws:ssm:us-west-2:490416305747:document/LifecycleHookTest
